Prompt.masterLabel: Change to Sales Org Code process on Opportunities

promptVersions.body:
ALERT: Effective Monday, July 6th, we are transitioning to an auto-populated Sales Org Code on Opportunities. As a result, you no longer need to populate the Sales Team Organization when creating your Opportunities. This change is retroactive and will update to show the Sales Org Code on the Opportunities you’ve already created. No action is needed on your part.


﻿**Please forward any questions, regarding the Sales Org Code number, to your Finance partner.**
